title.en: Merched y Wawr Llanafan Branch Garage Band
title.cy: Band y Garej Merched y Wawr Cangen Llanafan

description.en:
Band y Garej Merched y Wawr Cangen Llanafan yn Eisteddfod Ffug 2004.  
Rhes flaen – Elin Evans, Enid Evans, 
Ail Res – Glenda Davies, Alwena Richards, Beryl Young, Donia Richards, Ceridwen Lloyd Morgan, Joan Jones (Hawys Hughes tu ôl), Margaret Williams, Gaynor Evans, Verona Davies
